title: LoL Client Broken

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), run it with the default settings and reply with a link to the **LoL-Logs.zip** folder it creates on your desktop here.
